dcterms:description: A dataset comprising approximately 56,000 crystal structures and their corresponding Density of States (DOS) spectra, generated using the OptB88vdW functional with automatic convergence for k-points and Gaussian smearing.
dcterms:title: JARVIS-DFT dataset
